div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 921 Maca, Nova Zagora district, Bulgaria, 1954 Burial: c. 125-100 B.C. (T) Contents: 520 AR Alexander III: 24 tetradr.; 30 dr. Macedonia, 1st Region: 1 tetradr. Thasos: 411 spread-flan tetradr. Lysimachus: 22 tetradr. Disposition: Nova Zagora 488 Gerasimov, BIAB 20 (1955), p. 610
